post:
Hey everyone,

Sorry for the plain topic, no flashy buttons, text or images.
We got a nice deal for you guys:

Dedicated servers in Sweden, Stockholm. (swedendedicated.com)

€25 per month, no commitment, pay as you go.

Processors: E3-1270V2, E3-1220V2, E5-2440, E5-2407 (random!)
Memory: 8GB or 16GB (random)
Hard disk: 300GB SAS, 600GB SAS, 500GB SATA or 1TB SATA (random)
Monthly data transfer 10TB
Connection 1000 Mbit
Ipv4 IP1

Network: AS42237 (our very own)

RULES: requests for specific cpu, memory, disk is not possible. Upgrades/changes to a server are also not possible.
We can install almost all operating systems.
IPMI not possible, they are all behind private vlans and internal switches for your security as well as ours.
No spam or serious illegal content, besides that we couldn't care what you run on it.
Ipv6 not possible with this product.

https://billing.swedendedicated.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=93
http://lg.swedendedicated.com

Questions, please email us we don't check LET every minute.
